text: Masih ibn Maryam siva paighambar hone ke aur kuch bhi nahi, us se pehle bhi bahuth se paighambar ho chuke hai, un ki waaleda ek raasth baaz aurath thi, duno maa bete khaana khaaya karte thein, aap dekhiye ke kis tarah hum un ke saamne dalile rakhte hai, phir ghaur ki jiye ke kis tarah wo phire jaate hai
